leads.lead_text: Outer cypselas mostly without a beak; leaves usually glabrous, or if hairy, then sparsely so and mainly on the margins; ligules hardly exceeding involucre; plant annual
All cypselas beaked; leaves usually hairy; ligules greatly exceeding involucre; plant perennial
